mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_POST ( title, content, user_no, board_type, created_at, last_modified_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{user_no}, 'SNS', sysdate(), sysdate() )
INSERT INTO B_COMMENT ( content, post_no, user_no, parent_comment_no, created_at ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{post_no}, #{user_no}, #{parent_comment_no}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE B_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, last_modified_at = sysdate() WHERE seq = #{boardId};
UPDATE B_POST SET state = 'N' WHERE seq = #{boardId};
mapper.select: SELECT B.seq AS comment_no, B.content AS content, DATE_FORMAT(B.created_at, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, M_USER.id AS user_id, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM B_COMMENT_LIKE CL WHERE CL.comment_no = B.seq AND CL.user_no = #{userId} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS comment_like_yn, CAST(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B_COMMENT_LIKE CL WHERE CL.comment_no = B.seq ) AS CHAR) AS comment_like_num, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM B_COMMENT_HATE CH WHERE CH.comment_no = B.seq AND CH.user_no = #{userId} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS comment_hate_yn, CAST(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM B_COMMENT_HATE CH WHERE CH.comment_no = B.seq ) AS CHAR) AS comment_hate_num, ( SELECT M_USER.id FROM B_COMMENT BC JOIN M_USER ON BC.user_no = M_USER.seq WHERE BC.seq = B.parent_comment_no ) AS parent_comment_user_id FROM B_COMMENT B JOIN M_USER ON B.user_no = M_USER.seq WHERE B.post_no = #{boardId} ORDER BY B.created_at;
